Additional sponsors: Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Young of Indiana, Mr. Tiberi, Mr. Reichert, Mr. Reed, Mr. Price of Georgia, Mr. Stivers, and Mrs. Brooks of Indiana
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the rule allowing certain tax-free distributions from individual retirement accounts for charitable purposes.

section.header: Rule allowing certain tax-free distributions from individual retirements accounts for charitable purposes made permanent

subsection.text: Section 408(d)(8) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (F).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to distributions made in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Permanent IRA Charitable Contribution Act of 2014.
